description:
nova quota-update wrong-tenantid --instances 5

nova returns with status: 200 

It is expected to return the status 404 (not found)
Also it should error out with message e.g.- tenant not found.
title: quota-update should error out if input provided is wrong tenant id

comments.content:
nova quota-update wrong-tenantid --instances 5

nova returns with status: 200 

It is expected to return the status 404 (not found)
Also it should error out with message e.g.- tenant not found.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~tushar-bankar

comments.content: The following blueprint should fix the bug described above: https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/validate-tenant-user-with-keystone. The blueprint is pending approval.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~thang-pham

comments.content: Abandoning this bug as the solution for this bug has been already proposed in blueprint stated above
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~tushar-bankar
